casebody.data:
No. 09-8914. Bruce Earl Ward, Petitioner v. Ray Hobbs, Interim Director, Arkansas Department of Correction. 559 U.S. 1051, 130 S. Ct. 2367, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 3002.

176 L. Ed. 2d 566,

April 5, 2010.

Petition for writ of certio-rari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 577 F.3d 925.
